member.name: T:Utilities.RegularExpression
member.summary: Basic regular expression wrapper

member.name: M:Utilities.RegularExpression.IsPhoneNumber(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Check if the given input is matching the phone number (Thailand phone number is default)
member.param: Regex pattern to check whether the input is matched or not

member.name: M:Utilities.RegularExpression.IsEmail(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Check if the given input is matching the email
member.param: Regex pattern to check whether the input is matched or not

member.name: M:Utilities.RegularExpression.IsOnlyDigit(System.String)
member.summary: Check if the given input is matching the number-only

member.name: M:Utilities.RegularExpression.IsOnlyText(System.String)
member.summary: Check if the given input is matching the string-only (English and Thai alphabetics only)

member.name: T:Utilities.Cryptography
member.summary: Simple wrapper for cryptography methods

member.name: M:Utilities.Cryptography.Encrypt(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Encrypt given plain text into hash string with specific salt
member.param: Salt using to calculate the hash

member.name: M:Utilities.Cryptography.Decrypt(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Decrypt given hash string into plain text with specific salt
member.param: Salt using to calculate the hash

member.name: M:Utilities.Cryptography.GenerateHash(System.String,System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generate combination of hash string and salt string from given plain text and salt byte array
member.param: Salt using to calculate the hash

member.name: M:Utilities.Cryptography.GenerateHash(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generate combination of hash string and salt string from given plain text

member.name: M:Utilities.Cryptography.GenerateHash(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generate combination of hash string and salt string from given plain text and salt base64 string
member.param: Base64 string using to calculate the hash

member.name: M:Utilities.Cryptography.Verify(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Compare the plain text with given hash and salt

member.name: M:Utilities.Cryptography.GenerateSalt
member.summary: Randomly generate salt byte array

member.name: M:Utilities.Cryptography.SecureRandomString(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Provide statistically random string generate with customizable length and combination.

member.name: T:Utilities.Security.Cryptography.AES
member.summary: Simple wrapper for Advance Encryption Standard.

member.name: M:Utilities.Security.Cryptography.AES.Encrypt(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Encrypt data by given key using Advance Encryption Standard.

member.name: M:Utilities.Security.Cryptography.AES.Decrypt(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Decrypt data by given key using Advance Encryption Standard.

member.name: T:Utilities.Security.Cryptography.RSA
member.summary: Simple wrapper for Rivest–Shamir–Adleman method

member.name: M:Utilities.Security.Cryptography.RSA.KeyGenerator
member.summary: Generate private key and public key as a pair.
member.returns: Tuple of private and public key

member.name: M:Utilities.Security.Cryptography.RSA.CreatePrivateKey
member.summary: Generate private key.

member.name: M:Utilities.Security.Cryptography.RSA.CreatePublicKey(System.String)
member.summary: Generate public key using private key.

member.name: M:Utilities.Security.Cryptography.RSA.Encrypt(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Encrypt raw data using public key

member.name: M:Utilities.Security.Cryptography.RSA.Decrypt(System.String,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Decrypt encrypted byte array using private key
member.returns: Raw data of encrypted byte array

member.name: M:Utilities.Shared.Data.RowBuilder``1(System.Data.Common.DbDataReader)
member.summary: Convert DbDataReader into POCO object using reflection using implicit inference (torelance for mismatch data type but slower down the building process)
member.param: data reader to convert to POCO object

member.name: M:Utilities.Shared.Data.RowBuilderExplicit``1(System.Data.Common.DbDataReader)
member.summary: Convert DbDataReader into POCO object using reflection using explicit inference (can cause the property to be default or null if mismatch data type but has a significant improved speed compare to implicitly style.)
member.param: data reader to convert to POCO object

member.name: M:Utilities.Shared.Data.RowBuilder(System.Data.Common.DbDataReader,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Convert DbDataReader into dynamic object with specified column name
member.param: data reader to convert to dynamic object

member.summary: Collection of Emnumerable extension methods

member.name: M:Utilities.Shared.Enumerator.Merge``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0}[])
member.summary: Combine 2 or more enumerable of the same type into new enumerable

member.name: M:Utilities.Shared.Enumerator.SubEnumerable``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Create new enumerable from given enumerable, start index and count

member.name: M:Utilities.Shared.Enumerator.TakeLast``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},System.Int32)
member.summary: Take last element out of given enumerable

member.summary: Execute SELECT SQL query and return IEnumerable of specified POCO that is matching with the query columns
